Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Alantô stavan in Caignan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Alantoa gh’aveiva dex’anni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Allevâ a moffa con un rasccetto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Allevâ unna maccia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Allevâse i vestî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Allongame a sâ, pe piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa à doman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa gh’aiva çinqu’anni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa ghe son, son vivo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa no gh’é da perde atro tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa vegnimmo niatri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, amiga mæ, comme ti stæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, anemmo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, comme anemmo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, cös’a v’à contou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, cöse femmo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, dond’eimo arrivæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, in sciâ fin cöse l’é successo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, scemmo, cöse ti fæ chì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa, ti vëgni?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aloa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Alon, fæ vedde un pö e moen!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Alon, mesciæve!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Alora, o ve gusta?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Amanaman o me levià o formaggio d’in sciâ menestra!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Amma o tò scimile.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiâ a televixon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia ben de vegnî inderê à casa!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia che no ti cazzi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia che o figgeu o no cazze d’in sciô carreghin!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia comm’a l’é reduta quella pövea meschinetta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia comme ti t’ê reduto!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia d’anâ cianin!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia de no cazze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiâ i oggetti in espoxiçion inte un museo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammia in sciâ televixon à neuv’oe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiæ ch’aivimo da veddise mez’oa fa!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiæ che o can o l’addenta, no stæ à toccâlo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiæ de no cazze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiæ de studiâ un pö de ciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiæ quello che fæ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiemmo avanti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiemmo d’allontanâ e gente de sta ciassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiime drito inti euggi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ammiime inti euggi tanto che te parlo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An accuggeito de ramme secche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An arrestou l’assascin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An arretiou tutto quello zetto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An cattou di vestî neuvi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An ciammou pròpio mi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An ciammou seu figgio Zòrzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An dæto l’avao a-o barco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An fæto di grendi progresci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An fæto scoaccin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An fæto un passo fäso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An fæto un ponte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An firmou o contratto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An inandiou tutti i arneixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An locciou a testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An misso a-o mondo çinque figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An piccou da-a pòrta intanto ch’ea apreuvo à vestîme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An piccou da-a pòrta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An portou a sede à Saña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An portou via quello che poeivan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An provou à scappâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An provou à traversâ à remmi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An pubricou un studio in scê tradiçioin ligure.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An pubricou unn’òpia scientifica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An rebasciou o prexo do petròlio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An remandou l’incontro à dòppo e feste.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An renonçiou à l’incarrego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An sforsou a ciaveuia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An sostegnuo l’attacco pe doî giorni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An taggiou a testa a-o re.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An tiou sciù un ponte tra-e rive do sciumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An tiou sciù unna miagia de pria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: An vosciuo ti pe quello travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ à cavallo, à pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ à vedde un’espoxiçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ a-o bagno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ apreuvo a-e regole.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ apreuvo a-o ritmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ avanti co-a lettua de un romanso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ in penscion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ in proçescion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anâ in sciô travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anæ a-o mercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu a no l’é de seguo à cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu ceuve in sce l’Italia do mezo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu emmo camminou pe unn’oa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu emmo mangiou e trenette co-o pesto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu gh’é a frïtâ de succhin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu in figua, doman in seportua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i dexe de frevâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i doî de setembre do doa mia dixineuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i doî de zugno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i neuve de mazzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i sette de agosto, San Donou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é i trei de marso do mille neuve çento novant’e neuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é un giorno de grande importansa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é unna giornâ ciæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu l’é venardì a-i unze de frevâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu veuggio arrestâ in cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancheu veuggio mangiâ de magro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancioe piñe a-a zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancon d’assæ che no ea in cà!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ancon d’assæ che quarcösa gh’é arrestou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ à arröbâ l’uga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ à cantâ in sce unn’atra carassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ à dormî à l’oa de galliñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ à reisego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ à tö a-o son do campanin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ a-a ventua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ a-a vòtta de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ apreuvo a-i atri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ co-a vorpe sotto l’ascella.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ co-e moen in sciâ faccia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ co-o vento in poppa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ con finçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ de boeña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ de mäveggia unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ feua de propöxito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ feua do semenou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in conversaçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in gio pe-a çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in scappin de cäsetta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in scê euve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ in sciâ paròlla de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâ via mocco mocco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andâsene a-a ciaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Andavan avanti e inderê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo à corrî, ò megio ancon à nuâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo à piggiâ un treno chesesegge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo à spaçio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo a-a descoverta de Zena.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo a-o çentro commerçiâ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo a-o supermercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Anemmo inte Stradde Neuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aniemo à stâ de casa in Fransa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrancâ d’inte brasse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrancâ unna cösa co-e tenagge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrecoviâ o steumago.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arregòrdimelo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrëlâ un fî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arresta ciù pöchi giorni pe Natale.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arresto à sentî sta stöia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arriæ e veie!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrivian de chì à doe settemañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrivian de chì à sei meixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arriviò de chì à quarche giorno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arrivo, son quæxi à tio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arröbâ inta mesua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvâ vegia, no se gh’açende ciù candeie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arve a-a cappuçiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvî a bocca, i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvî a pòrta, son o commissäio de poliçia!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvî e giöxie!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvî o l’à trenta e se ciuvesse trent’un o no saeiva mâ nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Arvîse o cheu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asbasciâ a vista.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asbrivâse in çimma a-o nemigo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ascäda o forno e cheuxi o pan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ascciæîse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ascì gh’aiva dæto a mente!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aslonghîse a vitta, allonghîse a vitta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asmeuggio in ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asmòrta a luxe!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asneixi da travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aspëtâ a balla a-o botto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aspëtemmo ancon quarche menuto, sciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aspetime a-a fermâ de l’autobo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Asseguâ a bandea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Assettite, pe piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Assotterrâ o cadaveo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Astalla a lengua!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Astrego de risseu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Astrenziemo a quantitæ di invitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Atro che eröe, t’ê un laddro!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Attaccou co-o spuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Attivitæ e pubricaçioin scientifiche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Autô e compoxitô zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Autoa e compoxitoa zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avansan verso a squaddra avversäia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avanti a l’ea intrâ e dapeu a l’ea torna feua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avanti de pensâ a-i dinæ, ammia pe primma cösa de comportâte ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aveei un fâ ch’innamoa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a barba scciassa.

Sentence: Avei a bocca sciuta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a faccia comme a battua da balla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a goa fasciâ de færo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a goa foddrâ de lamma.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a grigoa de doe coe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a luña imbösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a mente seña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a spâ da-o manego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a vista storbia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei a-o cheu unna cösa.

Sentence: Avei açion in sce unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei ciù pöco lin in sciâ ròcca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei da mostarda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei di acidi in sciô steumago.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei e còrne inta stacca e mettisele in testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei e moen inti cavelli, inte stacche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei fæto patto co-o diao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei i euggi che cianzan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei i euggi into coppuso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei i papê netti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei i pê inta fòssa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei i speggetti brutti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei in conscideraçion unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei l’argento vivo adòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei l’oegia marsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o cheu con tanto de pei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o diao adòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o feugo a-o panê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o santo in còrpo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o spirito da distruçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei o verme scimonin adòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei panno e tesoie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei poia che manche a tæra sotto a-i pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei qualche santo protettô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei sempre a pansa à l’äia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei sempre a-e còste unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei trei dinæ in sce un södo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei trei södi in sce un dinâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei un cheu de pria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei un libbro inte moen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei un muggio de vestî inte l’armäio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei un òsso duo da rosiggiâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna boña peña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna boña vista.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna borsa in scê spalle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna brutta relaçion co-o prinçipâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna còrba d’anni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna lengua ch’a taggia e a cuxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avei unna testa feua de proporçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Aveine un barlumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avvardâ unna persoña da un reisego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avvoxæme che son duxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Avvoxou da-i critichi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Azzonzi doe legne a-o camin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Baccæ da òrbi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bäçigâse in sciâ carrega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Baiâ comme un can.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Balla de gomma, da cannon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Banca de l’ase.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bandea vegia, önô de capitanio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Barba do granon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Basta co-a raggia!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bastava che ti m’ô divi e saiæ vegnuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bätâ quarche paròlla con un.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bätâ un disco pe un libbro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Batte di denti, di euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Batte e nisseue.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Batte monæa fäsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Batte o ballon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Battise o moccin de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beati i urtimi se i primmi an discreçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beive à goæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beive o læte de crava.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beive o læte de vacca, de crava.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beivise unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beivo unna bira media.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ben ch’o m’ammenassa, poia mi no n’ò.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ben che â tie, a pòrta a no veu arvîse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ben che se semmo sforsæ, no semmo arriescii à finî o travaggio pe tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ben che travaggio, n’arriëscio à arrivâ a-a fin do meise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Benvegnuo, messê l’abbou!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bescheutti into cû.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna anâ de boeña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna asbasciâ a testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna avei sempre a voxe per l’äia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna avvardâ a natua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna azzonze quelli doî fî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che fasse controllâ i fren da machina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che gh’ô dî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che mescemmo o sofà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che passe unna man de gianco in scê miage.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che pòrte a televixon à fâghe dâ recatto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna che reduxemmo e speise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna concordâ l’aggettivo e o nomme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna fâ a çernia con un pittin de critëio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna mette insemme e fòrse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna organizzâ sti papê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna pensâ a-a salute.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna piggiâ de bòtte e baxâ o brugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna piggiâ o mondo comm’o ven.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna piggiâne de cade e de freide.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna rispettâ pe ëse rispettou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beseugna sentîle tutte e campañe sunnâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bestie de tutte e meñe e forme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Beuh!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bollâ e ræ in mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bollettin do tempo in sciô Mediterraneo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bollo de cicolata.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bon derê de l’anno!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Boña mesua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Böna, à doman!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Boñe paròlle e meie nisse no rompan a testa à nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bongiorno sciô mego!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Borrasca fòrsa eutto in sciô Mâ de Còrsega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bòssa, o cantonê!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Bòssa, ti porriësci cazze!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Brassetto da potensa do releuio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Brutto comme o peccou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Busancâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Butega da perrucchê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Butega da pollaieu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cà de pria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cacciâ in mâ un inte un sacco con unna pria a-o còllo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cacciâ o ballon inta ræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cacciâse tutto zu pe-a goa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cacciâse unna cösa derê a-e spalle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cagâ into carbon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminâ à passo lento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminâ a-o ciæo de luña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminâ in scappin de cäsette.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminâ in scî bricchi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cammiñan aviou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cammiñan verso a pòrta de San Benardin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminavan co-o cappello in man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Camminemmo in ponta de pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cammiño in sciâ stradda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Campo de battaggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Campo de patatte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Can co-a raggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cangiæme çinquanta euro pe piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cangiando de luña se cangia fortuña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cannâ da goa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cannâ da gronda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cantiña do carbon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cao lettô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Capacità d’espressione.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cappo Horn o l’é a ponta estrema de l’America do Sud.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carcolemmo a traiettöia preçisa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carcolilo giusto, sta vòtta!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carne co-i poïsci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carne inte costiggeue.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carregâse o steumago.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Carta canta e villan dòrmi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cartelle do releuio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cäsâ unna veia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cascia de l’euggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cäsette fæte à l’agoggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Categoria de grammatica, de scintasci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cattâ un pesso de recangio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cavâ a moula de òsse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cavi de l’erta tenscion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cazze da-a poela inte braxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cazze e brasse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cazze l’euio in sciâ fava.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çê pöco nuvio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çento çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çercâ o mâ comme i meghi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çercan de mette in equilibrio a straponta in sciô teito da machina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çerchemmo un travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çerni mi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çertidun s’appensan ch’a segge unna böxia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ceuve à deruo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ceuve à rotta de còllo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Che belle scioî!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Che bello bleuçê!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Che euggi gròsci che t’æ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Che l’é çinque giorni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Che meña de bestia o l’é?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à arte à parte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à bella moggê, a non é tutta a sò.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à beseugno de feugo pòrze o dio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à da fâ cammin ammie o tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à de crave à de còrne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à fæto mâ, fasse a penintensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à in man à vinto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à o cû de paggia, à poia ch’o ghe pigge feugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à premmua vadde adaxo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à tempo à vitta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi à tempo n’aspete tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi â veu cheutta e chi â veu crua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi alleva di figgeu, alleva di nemixi seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì ascì ceuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì ascì tutto ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi balla sensa son o l’é matto ò mincion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi balla sensa son, l’é matto opû mincion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì beseugna finî fito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi cao se ten, cao se vende.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì coscì gh’é tutto cianello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi de galliña nasce, in tæra ruspa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi de vinti no n’à, de trenta no sa, maiciù o n’à avuo e maiciù o n’avià.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi doe levre caccia, uña a fuzze e l’atra a scappa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi dòrme co-i chen, se leva co-e pruxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi fa crensa e vende assæ, perde l’amiciçia e i dinæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi fa i conti sensa l’òste, beseugna fâli træ vòtte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi fa l’arte e no â conosce, i sò dinæ diventan mosche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì gh’é solo che de gente ignorante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi ghe l’à se ghe ô tëgne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì ghe mettiæ un aggettivo ch’o ghe stagghe ciù ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì ghe n’é doî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi ghe patisce, se fasse chinâ in tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi ghe stà a-o cian de sotta?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi l’à asmòrto a televixon?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi l’à da l’òsso ô pòrta a-o fòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi l’à taggiou co-o mæ cotello?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi l’é ch’o l’à scancellou a lavagna?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi lascia a stradda vegia e piggia a neuva, spesso gabbou se treuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi lava a testa à l’ase perde a lescia e o savon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi loua mangia unn’ancioa e chi no loua ne mangia doe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi mâ intende pezo risponde.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi me veu ben me fa cianze, chi me veu mâ me fa rie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi n’à memöia, à gambe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi nasce bello, nasce affortunou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi nasce matto no guarisce mai.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi no rompe scrosce.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi no se mesua, no dua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì no se peu intrâghe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi no se schersa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi no veu vegnî vegio, in Sarzan fan da còrda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi non à amô a-e bestie, no l’à manco a-i crestien.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi non à atro che un pan, o fornâ o ghe bruxa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi non à de memöia à gambe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi o l’é o propietäio de sto terren?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi o l’é quello scignoro lazzù?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi o l’é sto chì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi o no l’é satisfæto di resurtati?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi ô sa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi paga avanti l’é mâ servio inderê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì parlemmo ligure.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi pegoa se fa o lô o se â mangia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi primma arriva s’aspete.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi rie de venardì, cianze in domenega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi rie do mâ di atri, o sò o se gh’appròscima.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi röba à, mercante aspeta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi se mesccia con di figgeu s’imbratta e die de merda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chì semmo à Zena!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi serve o commun, no serve nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi te l’à dito?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi tròppo tia, a còrda a se streppa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va a-o pasto sensa invio, l’é mâ visto e mâ servio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va con un rango, a-o cavo de l’anno diventa rango e sòppo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va de testa, paga de borsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va in letto sensa çeña, tutta a neutte se remeña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va pe feugo perde leugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi va pe ingannâ resta ingannou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi veu avei do mosto, sappe a vigna d’agosto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chi zazzuña e atro ben o no fa, à cà do diao drito o ghe va.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chinâ a testa, i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chiña zu de lì!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chinemmo i urtimi scæn.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chiño i scæn.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chiño i urtimi scæn.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chinze töe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Chisesæ ch’o ô vegnià à savei, o l’attrovià da dî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ci siamo limitati a due giorni di vacanza.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciammæme quande finisce a festa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciammæne quande sei lesti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciammilo torna, perché o no t’à sentio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantâ i euggi adòsso à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantala de ascidiâte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantila de dindanâte e treuvite un travaggio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantila de sbatte o barcon!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantila de sbraggiâ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantila ò te mòllo un pugno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciantila un pö de correzime delongo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciao à tutti!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciao, fræ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciaschedun de voiatri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinqu’oe de poidisnâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinquant’e sëi machine inta galleria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinquant’eutto scioî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinquanta palanche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinque çento quattòrze metri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinque crave.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinque dexigrammi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Çinque meno doî o l’é trei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cioccâ e moen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cioccâle à un.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciù che tutto me sovvëgne i seu cavelli rosci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciù se dexidia unna cösa e meno a se peu ottegnî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ciù tardi ò da vedde mæ fræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cô da çenie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cô de çeixao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cô de l’uga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cô de reusa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cô do sangue de drago.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Co-a scheña contr’a-a miagia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Co-e boñe ò co-e gramme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Co-i axi ghe veu o torçiou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Co-i matti ghe veu o brugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Co-o tempo e a paggia se maturan e nespoe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Coa de vorpe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Coâ l’euio da frizze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Coccio do can.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Collâ unna meixiña amaa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Colpo de ponta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Combatte a povertæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Combatte contra i nemixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comensa à ceuve!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comm’a l’é bella Camoggi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comm’a l’é che ti sbraggi coscì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comm’a l’é?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comm’a se ciamma a teu tratugoa d’ægua?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comm’a va?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme arrivo à cà m’infriccio sott’a-e coverte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme arrivo à casa veuggio rescioâme un pittin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme deuviâ o diçionäio?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme l’é ch’o se ciamma quello ristorante?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme l’é poscibile?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme mai ti sbraggi coscì?
