Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme o fa de nomme?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme o s’acciamma de nomme o sciô Parodi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme poei remarcâ, chì no gh’é nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme se fa à creddise quella stöia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme se fa à piggiâ pe vea quella stöia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme se fa inte sti caxi, ò fæto e condolianse a-o vidoo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme se ghe dixe in ingreise à sta çittæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme t’é bella!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme ti peu comportâ de vive à sta mainea?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme ti stæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme ti t’acciammi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme ti te ciammi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme ti te permetti?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Comme vëgno inderê da Milan te daggo un ciammo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Commensæ torna à leze da-a pagina donde se semmo affermæ vëi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Commentâ e neuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Compî delongo i mæximi erroî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Compî unna gramma açion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Compoñi o teu adresso de pòsta elettrònica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con l’amê se piggia e mosche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con l’arrembo de seu poæ o l’à trovou un lou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con l’arte e con l’inganno se vive tutto l’anno, con l’inganno e l’arte se vive l’atra parte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con piaxei!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con sta seçia l’é façile che i erboi no vivan ciù guæi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con sti spegetti ghe veddo tutto doggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con sto libbro o l’à piggiou tanta nòmina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con tutto che ciuveiva son anæto à corrî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con tutto che gh’é o sô o l’é freido.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con tutto che gh’é stæto un scciuppon l’emmo scampâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con viægiâ an piggiou de l’espeiensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Con viatri no ghe vëgno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Conçerto pe violin e orchesta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Concon da bugâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Condannæ à mòrte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Condue l’orchesta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Confiâ unna cösa à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Confio in lê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Conosce e sò pegoe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Conosce o ben da-o mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Conoscio dötræ de persoñe chi gh’ea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Conquistâ unna tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Consummâ comme a giassa a-o sô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Contâ comme o sbiro à gòffo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Contâ i boccoin che un o se mette in bocca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Contâ i drappi a-a bugaixe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Contròlla che i papê seggian lesti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Coppa do cuggiâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Core a voxe che s’an accattou a partia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Corporaçioin religiose.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Correze i exerçiçi de matematica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Correze o cafè co-a rappa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Correze o corso de un sciumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Correze un errô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Correzime se diggo mâ, ma lê a l’é todesca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cös’à da fâ o succao rosou co-i bertoeli?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cös’o l’é ch’o bruxa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cös’o l’é o ligure?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cös’o t’à replicou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Coscì, à uso traitô?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse da matti!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse da rie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse diascoa o dixe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse gh’é da çeña?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse o dixe o tò avvocou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse o fa o governo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse t’ê bon de fâ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse ti fæ oua?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse ti gh’æ da rie?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse ti pensi de sciortîne da-a vendia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cöse ti veu?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Covertua do teito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Credde inta reincarnaçion de anime.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Creddo ch’aggimo fæto ben à no dîghe ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Creña de banse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Creppâ da-a salute.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Creuvite che l’é freido.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cruçiâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cû de gòtto, de bottiggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cuggiæ di pontoin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Cuscinetto do pontaieu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: D’in gio gh’é pin de figgioammi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: D’inverno se mangia e rostie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: D’ògni tanto a cianzeiva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a benediçion à unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a boñaneutte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a còrda a-o lumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a còrda a-o releuio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a diaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a mente a-i figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dà a mente de no cazze!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ a-e mosche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ bon conto da sò persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da chì à un pö semmo à casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ da beive a-e ciante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ da beive a-e pegoe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ de baccæ inte l’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ de ciattonæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ de man a-a spassoia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ di commandi a-i sordatti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ di crii de contentessa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ di ponti into zeugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ e boñe feste.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ i sò recatti à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ in cogge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ in sciâ voxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da l’atra banda do sciumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ l’avao à unna longa tradiçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da largo partio avvardime Dio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ leçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da lettiatua ruscia no ne sò ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da maniman s’é fæto indispensabile domandâghe aggiutto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o carreghin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o colpo de graçia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o nomme da-e feste.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o resto da parpaggieua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o sbratto à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ o sfratto à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da ògni oa nasce fonzi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da sti mei mæ barba o l’ottëgne un vin ben ben grammo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da sto contræto ne emmo tiou feua un bello guagno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da tutte e bande se sentiva di gren sbraggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ un arregòrdo à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da un comme quello no se ghe peu aspëtâ guæi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da un mâ spesso ne nasce un ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da un momento à l’atro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ un strapontin à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ unna bòtta a-o çercio e l’atra a-a botte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ unna scrollâ de spalle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ unna smentia à un.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâ unna succâ contra a miagia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da zennâ à arvî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da zoeno portava i speggetti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-a proa a-a poppa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-e cattive paghe beseugna sciortîne comme se peu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-e nòstre bande no ceuve mai.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-e nòstre bande.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-e poule s’é passæ aviou a-i fæti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-o barcon se vedde a gexa co-o campanin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-o dito a-o fæto passa un gran træto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Da-o marso a-a moffa gh’é pöco da levâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dæ da beive a-o præve che o cego o l’à sæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dæ unna man de cô a-a miagia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dagghe un cäso!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâgghe unn’euggiâ quande ti veu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dagghe, mandime o ballon!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâghe un spellinsegon in sciô còllo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dâghe zu un taggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Damme quarche conseggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Danni a mente a-o travaggio, pe piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dapeu o s’é misso torna à dormî co-a pansa piña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Davei no ve dæ conto de quello che l’é apreuvo à intravegnî?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De amixi ghe n’à pe coscì, ghe n’à tanti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De che cô o l’é?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De chì à doe settemañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De chì à doman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De chì no ghe passa mai nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De chì se peu trae de leçioin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De chì se vedde tutto Zena.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De cöse pæge no ean mai intravegnue.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De cöse ti parlavi vëi, intanto che camminavimo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De cöse ti parli?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De d’inte profonditæ do mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De de chì se vedde un panorama mäveggioso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De donde te sciòrtan feua de idee comme sta chì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De gambe sottî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De legno, de færo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De mæ amighe, ghe n’é quarcheduña ch’a l’à piggiou a laurea in matëie scientifiche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De marso, chi no peu andâ cäsou vadde descäso, ma chi ê à, no e lasce in cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De mätesdì o pòrta delongo i figgi a-a pisciña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De neutte i gatti son bardi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De neutte ò beseugno d’unna coverta imbottia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De novello tutto é bello, de stagion tutto l’é bon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De pei rosso, manco boña a vitella.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De preuve contra de lê no ghe n’ea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De seguo o l’é un di megio zugoei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De settembre e d’agosto beivi o vin vegio e lascia stâ o mosto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De spesso se gh’allamenta sensa raxon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De sprescia no ghe n’é.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De sta stagion o sô o s’erze assæ fito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De tòrti lê o no n’à.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De vòtte beseugna fâ comme can chi nega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: De za che t’ê chì, dimme un pö.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Decidde in sciô campo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Defæti, cöse t’aiva dito?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Defende l’imputou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Delongo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Deluviâse unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dente de l’euggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Deprescion de saxon in sciô Mediterraneo de levante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Desarrembo e giöxie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Descarregâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Desccegæ e veie!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Desfa o crescente inte l’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Despontâse o vestî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Destaccâ e patelle da-i scheuggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Destende à l’äia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Destende i moscoli.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Destende unna persoña in sce un canto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Deuviâ a miagia pe arrembo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Deuviâ tutte e energie che se gh’à inte un progetto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Devo attrovâ a mæ machina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Devo dâ da beive a-e tomate.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Devo dâ recatto a-a mæ stançia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Devo piggiâ l’examme de latin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dexe meizañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dexe, neuve, eutto, sette, sëi, çinque, quattro, trei, doî, un, zero.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî in sciô serio ò pe burla?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî mâ comme de strasse de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî röba da ciödi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Di sciummi d’inciòstro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî tutto o ben do mondo de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî un mondo de villanie à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî unna cösa in sciâ faccia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dî unna cösa in sciô moro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Di zoeni an occupou unna casa despixonâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Diæ che l’é arrivou l’oa de partî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dibattî in sce un argomento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Diggo mâ ò t’æ misso sciù da grascia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dinni pe primma cösa comme t’acciammi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dinni un dexidëio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dinni un dexio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dio n’avvarde!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dipende da-a voentæ de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Discorrimmo d’euve che l’é chì Pasqua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Discorsci ciatti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Disegnâ unna sciô, un erbo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dïsette citti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dispoñe i figgeu inte unna fia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Disputâ de l’ombra de l’ase.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dixan che o coccodrillo o se mangia i òmmi e dapeu o cianze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dixe a figgia de Torriggia, chi veu tutto ninte piggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dixineuve vòtte a-o meise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Do fæto sò ognun peu fâne quello ch’o veu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doa mia sëi çento sciusciant’e doî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doçe comme l’abbrasso d’unna dònna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doe ancioe averte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doe magnæ de fæña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doe peie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doe vacche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doggiâ o fî da scheña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doî bollettin da tiatro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doî chen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doî euro e dixeutto citti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doman à sëi oe ò un incontro de travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doman emmo l’examme de filosofia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doman gh’é a diaña à l’arba.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doman vaggo à un nataliçio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Domandâ indicaçioin à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Domenega ch’a vëgne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Domenega passâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Donca, fæme pensâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dond’a l’é a coxiña?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dond’a l’é a preisa da luxe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dond’a l’é l’intrâ do giardin?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dond’o l’é o tò senso d’avventua?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dond’o pòrta sto sentê?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Donde l’é ch’a l’à misso l’ægua santa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Donde l’é finio e ciave da machina?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Donde t’æ infricciou e fotografie?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dònna de ciassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dònna, cavallo e barca, son de chi ê cavarca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dònna, succa e çioula a n’é graçia de Dio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dònne, scciuppette e libbri no se ne presta à nisciun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo a converscion a l’à deciso de vegnî monega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo çent’anni l’ægua a torna a-o sò moin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo che gh’é mòrto a moæ o l’é cheito in deprescion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo doî giorni d’ægua o çê o l’é tornou bleu e sen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo e nuvie vien o sen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo o cattio tempo o vëgne o bon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo o doçe ven l’amao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo o nuvio ven o sen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo tanto en arriescii à acciappâ o delinquente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo un anno o l’à deciso de lasciâ i studdi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo unn’oa in scî fornelli o bròddo o s’é reduto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo unna carriera into tiatro, a s’é dæta a-a muxica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòppo unna giornâ de travaggio, ò beseugno de sciortî e de piggiâ un pö d’äia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dòrman in santa paxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dormî appoggiou in scê gomie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dormî de seunno duo, Dormî tutto de un seunno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dötrei gòtti d’ægua me faian scentâ a sæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dottô in lezze, in filosofia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dove gh’é stæto do feugo, gh’é sempre da çenie cada.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dovemmo dâ a mente a-e neuve regole.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Doviæ passâ o strasson pe tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dozze franchi a-o meise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dozze meixi inte un anno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Drito comme un fuso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Dua ciù un gòtto astrunou che un neuvo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Duxento anni de.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E a l’é anæta à stâ lontan de casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E alantoa cöse fasso mi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E aloa cöse fasso mi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E amighe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ancioe piñe de mæ madonnâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E arme de dònne son a lengua, e onge e e lagrime.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E atro!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E attivitæ letteräie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E böxie an e gambe curte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E braghe en despontæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E brasse de l’ancoa, da bansa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E buscagge s’assomeggian a-i çeppi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E butege toccæ da-o sciòpero.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ceighe de pagine.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ciantila d’abbesiggiâ teu seu!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E çioule bruxan i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E çiviltæ precolombiañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E colisse do treno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E condiçioin de sto contræto no me piaxan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E còrne di çervi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E cöse saià mai!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E cöse tiæ in longo no van mai ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E donca cöse fasso mi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E dònne ne san uña ciù che o diao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E feugge creuvan da-i erboi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E feugge se mescian co-o vento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E forse do mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E frontee da sciensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E galliñe fan e euve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E gente ciccioan pe-e stræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E gente perseguitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E giastemme son comme e feugge, che chi ê caccia se ê arrecheugge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E in sciâ fin cöse ti veu?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E instituçioin da Repubrica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E intræ son in scî scianchi do casamento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E isoe Canäie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E lê chi a saieiva?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E lê chi o saieiva?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E lengue romanse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E lettie ean stampæ mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E machine son in fonçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E miage parlan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E monæe neuve luxivan a-o sô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E multinaçionale contròllan l’economia do mondo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E naçioin de l’Euröpa son in guæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E niatri cöse ghe poemmo fâ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E no stæ à ronsâ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E oua dond’aniò?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E oua tutti à travaggiâ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E palanche che v’emmo lasciou son assæ pe un meise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E pe de ciù manco â conoscio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E pegoe contæ o lô o se ê mangia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E persoñe se conoscian da-o tratto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E poexie son arrecuggeite inte un libbro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E poule da mæ galante m’an arrecoviou o cheu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E prepoxiçioin zeneixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E previxoin pe-o Mâ Ligure.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ragge do releuio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ramme de l’erbo en mai tanto longhe che toccan o barcon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E scappava o Turco via, arrancandose a sciscia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E scignoe â stavan à sentî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E scioî vëgnan dæte a-e gente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E settemañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E seu compagne de scheua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E seu træ seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E sò masche rosse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E sò poule van pöco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E statue de marmao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E stelle n’an guiddou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E stöie de pirati m’an delongo tiou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E stöie de pirati o m’an delongo tiou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ti cöse ti veu?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E ti?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E troffiette co-o pesto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E veie en insce.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E viatri chi sei?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E vittöie in guæra e in amô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E vòstre lettie me son arrivæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E zu con de baccæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: E zu con de gosciæ de rie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean assettæ co-a scheña verso de mi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean di sciensiæ de grende conoscense.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean fiña contenti ch’a fïse anæta coscì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean lì che ammiavan e annie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean partii da Recco, da-o Pòrto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean riescie à dâghe feugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean stæti pagæ con da monæa fäsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ean vegnue amighe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Eben, açetto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Eh scì!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ei da anâ a-o cian dabasso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ei fæto aro into copiâ i dæti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ei reçevuo o pacco che v’ò spedio a settemaña passâ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ei semenou i çeixai?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo acciantou de parlâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo battuo l’atra squaddra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo camminou da unna parte à l’atra da çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo comensou vëi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo conosciuo o prescidente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo da destappâ o lavello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo da remondâ e çerse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo da trovâ unna soluçion pe mette tutti d’accòrdio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo da vedde s’o fonçioña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo dæto e semmo apreuvo à dâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo de amighe siçiliañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo deuviou st’occaxon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo dito a-i amixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo domandou à un ch’o passava de lì ch’o ne mostresse o cammin fin à l’abergo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo dovuo fermâ i travaggi apreuvo à unn’emergensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo fæto i pansöti co-a sarsa de noxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo fæto mâ à no anâghe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo fæto un diçionäio italian zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo fæto un gio à Arbenga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo finio o læte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo fissou o maiezzo pe zennâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo giusto o tempo de mangiâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo guägno!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo incontrou de gren difficoltæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo mangiou a pissa co-e çioule.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo mangiou a-o restorante de mæ barba.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo mangiou e bazzañe co-o salamme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo misso in vendia a casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo parlou da amixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo parlou de questo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo passou e feste in compagnia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo passou o confin à pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo patio di danni econòmichi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo perso o pòsto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo perso un muggio de tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo piggiou e mesue do mòbile.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo piggiou unna mouttia desconosciua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo piggiou unna stradda ch’a no l’andava miga ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo remondou o pei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo spëtou sott’a-e chinòlle do pòrtego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo stabilio o prexo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo vosciuo contracangiâghe o piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo votou contra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Emmo votou in libertæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: En cöse che no me divertan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: En de scarpe ch’o deuvia mävoentea pe-a poia d’arroinâle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: En stæti giudicæ corpevoli tutti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Enrico o l’é arrivou pe-o primmo, a Luisa pe-a segonda e o Giöxe pe-o terso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Entuxasmâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Episòdio de violensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a brutta còpia d’unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse à carrego de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse à ciongio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a festa de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse à ponto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a pria do scandalo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse à segno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse à stuffou inte un leugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a-a berliña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a-a dispoxiçion de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a-e canie de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a-o feugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse a-o scuo de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse amixi comme chen e gatti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ancon into prou de öche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse apreuvo à fâ unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse attaccou de peto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse bon à sunnâ o violin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciammou à unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciavou inte un letto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciù de paròlle che de fæti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciù gròsso che l’ægua di maccaroin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciù imbroggiou che un pollin inta stoppa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ciù lontan che zenâ da-e moie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse comme à sciorbî un euvo fresco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse comme o posso de San Patriçio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse condannou a-e speise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse consciderou comme un strasson.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse de casa comme a spassoia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse de doî parlæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse de façion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse de passo longo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse doî cû inte un pâ de braghe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse doî cû inte un pâ de cäsoin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse feua de stradda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse in cattiva poxiçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse in scê vinti træ oe e trei quarti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse inte graçie de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse inte nuvie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse l’önô de unn’arte, de un paise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse ligou comme un scciavo a-a cadeña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse o baston da vecciaia de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse o brasso drito de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse o figgio da galliña gianca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse per l’äia comme l’anima di sbiri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse rosso e fresco comme unna reusa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse san comme un pescio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse sciuto comme a lesca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse tentou da-o diao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ëse un cheu serrou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Esprimme un giudiçio poxitivo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggi abbiforcæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggi affosi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggi di bròddo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggi foddræ de carnesâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggi pin de recheutto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggio a-o barcon ch’o sbatte!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euggio do cû.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euio ch’o l’à a laña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Eutto gexe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Eutto tomate.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Euve à balletto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ a croxe co-o gomio à unna cosa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ a festa à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ a media aritmetica di numeri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ a speisa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ a vitta do Michelasso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ bombæa de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ boña mesua.
