Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ cantâ unna persoña in sce un atro ton.

Sentence: Fâ comme o gatto ch’o mangia e o rangogna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ comme Tommou, ch’o l’andò pe mincionâ e o l’é stæto mincionou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ da mòrto pe n’ëse ammassou.

Sentence: Fâ da pentemin.

Sentence: Fâ da violensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ de çeimònie.

Sentence: Fâ di brutti seunni.

Sentence: Fâ dinæ in sce un scheuggio.

Sentence: Fâ do cheu à unna persoña.

Sentence: Fâ e cöse in sprescia.

Sentence: Fâ e fòsse pe-a vigna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ e smòrfie à unna cösa chi no piaxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ fræ unna persoña.

Sentence: Fâ i denti a-a særa.

Sentence: Fâ i sò beseugni.

Sentence: Fâ i zeughi di busciolòtti.

Sentence: Fâ marçî o sangue.

Sentence: Fâ o callo à unna cösa.

Sentence: Fâ o carlevâ de unna cösa.

Sentence: Fâ o diao à quattro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ o giubileo de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ o scappin a-e cäsette.

Sentence: Fâ oege da mercante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ passâ un cavo inte un pertuso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ perde o çervello à un.

Sentence: Fâ piggiâ o cô a-a carne.

Sentence: Fâ piggiâ o doî de coppe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ portâ e còrne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ ribòtta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ sciortî sangue da unna pria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ sempre a mæxima istöia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ spiccâ e paròlle.

Sentence: Fâ tanta säçissa de unna persoña.

Sentence: Fâ tanta tonniña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ tante fregogge de unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ tanti tòcchi de unna cösa.

Sentence: Fâ un pö de letto à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ un scambelletto à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ unn’arcadia de paròlle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vedde a luña into posso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vedde o diao inte l’ampolletta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vedde unna cösa da-o pertuso da ciaveuia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vegnî a bocca aspia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vegnî a testa gròssa comme unna quarta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vegnî poæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vegnî seunno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vegnî triste.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâ vixita a-o barba maròtto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fabrica de savon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Faccia da imbriægon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fæña co-o pellisson.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Færo da fâ a stradda a-a særa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fæto à cannonetti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâghe andâ a cascia e i peteni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâla in scî euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fan a caitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fan o pesto into mortâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâne de tutte e cheutte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fanni comme ti fæ delongo e ti veddiæ ch’anià tutto ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fannila rostî à feugo lento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fantinetta de l’euggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fasciâ i figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse ammia apreuvo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse ammiâ apreuvo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse bruxâ i euggi de çioule di atri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse monega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse önô do sô de luggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse stradda tra-e gente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse vedde in ciæo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fâse vegnî o göscio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Federer o l’é o megio do tennis.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Femmo un fou in giardin con tutta a paggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Femmo un passo apreuvo à l’atro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fermo in sce doî pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Feua da-o barcon gh’é unna smersa de insetto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Feua de cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Feugo incroxou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ficcâse inte un leugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fiña o poæ o cianzeiva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Finché gh’é do sciou gh’é da speransa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Finî d’impî e bottigge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Finîla un pö!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Finimmola!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Finiscila!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fondetto do remescello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fontaña chi no sciuga mai.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Formaggette de consa da bruxâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Formaggio co-o pessigo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Formaggio sens’euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fòrte comme un tron.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fòscia conoscio quarcheduña de persoñe chi gh’ea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fòscia st’anno chì no aniemo in villezzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fòscia, ma niatri emmo delongo fæto coscì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fra mòrti e ferii l’é cheito o berrettin à un scciavo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fra unna poula e l’atra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Fræ Piggia o stà in convento e fræ Dà o no ghe stà drento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Frevâ curto o l’é pezo che un turco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Frizze o pescio inta poela.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gælo do tettin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Garantî a paxe, a giustiçia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Garantîse da-o freido, da-o cado.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Garson de butega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’â faiò pægio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ammanca solo che ti vagghi à pæzâ a bratta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an dæto o biggetto de badda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an dæto travaggio inte un banco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an dæto un premio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an doe figge e un nevo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an domandou d’ëse o poin di figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’an fæto de analixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’anemmo ben ben de spesso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é beseugno de un cangio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é çento çinquanta neuvi travaggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é çinque neuve casañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é da dî che no t’ê stæto franco con lê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é da fâ quaddrâ l’attivo e o pascivo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é da mesciâ a regiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é de differense tra o zeneise e o savoneise?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é de gente che passa pe stradda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é de quelli che no ghe gusta a ciccolata.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é de quelli che no se piggian mai poia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é doî nödi de vento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é dozze meie e ätretante peie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é pöco gòtti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é remedio à tutto feua che a-a mòrte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é sciusciant’eutto meie e tante peie pægio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é solo di vestî desmissi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é stæto de belle occaxoin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é stæto un ch’o m’à saluou pe-a strâ, gh’é stæto un tipo ch’o m’à saluou pe-a strâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é stæto unna perdia d’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é trei paixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é un ägno peigoso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é un ch’o veu vedde i papê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é unn’avertua tra e gente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é unna bella differensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é unna luxe de un giano ciæo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’é vegnuo da patî e a l’é cheita in tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea anche mæ seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea comme un çercio de luxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea d’anâ a-a dreitua fin à Turin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea de ville e di òrti cortivæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea do gran remescio pe-e stræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea lê e anche seu fræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea lê e seu fræ ascì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea mæ seu ascì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea mai tanta neive.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea tutti, zoeni e vegi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea un barcon a-a man drita da casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea un freido ch’o ponzeiva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ea un muggio de gente in çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò a pixon da pagâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò accattou dozze reuse rosse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò acciammou tantiscime scuse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò dæto unna lettia de sò moæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò dæto unna man d’aggiutto à dâ recatto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò di peccoei da dî a-o confessô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò dito graçie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’o l’amê d’acaccia, de tiggio e de castagno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò poia che segge tròppo tardi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò pròpio dæto!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò un travaggio da meza giornâ, coscì m’arresta do tempo pe studiâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gh’ò unna gran pascion pe-e stöie disegnæ da quand’ea piccin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe bruxa i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe davan de euggiæ da-a lontan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe l’ei dito?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe l’emmo fæta!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe n’é unna gran varietæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe ô conto inte doe poule.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe pensiemo dapeu!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe piaxe o sesso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe stemmo in çinque in töa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe streppan i vestî d’indòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe vaggo oua, sedonca no ghe aniò ciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe veddo ben!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe veu l’açento grave in sce sta lettia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe veu unna preisa de succao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghe vorriæ quarchedun d’esperto in sce st’argomento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ghindao do bugatto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Giâ o volante da machina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Giancaia brutta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Goa de lavello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gödîse o spettacolo de l’arba.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Graçie a-a pubricaçion de quello libbro a s’é fæta famosa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Graçie do tò contributo, ch’o l’é stæto importante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Graçie pe-a bella seiaña!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Gramma quella pegoa chi no sa avvardâ a sò laña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Grattâ a testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Grattemmo o formaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Grattemmo o pan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Grixo comme a çenie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Guägnâ e eleçioin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Guägnâ i dinæ comme l’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Guägnâse o pan co-o sò suo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Guiddâ i sordatti à l’assato.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I accòrdi do doa mia un.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I amaretti do Sascello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I amixi an mangiou de repentio ascì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I amixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I attoî en sciortii in sciô parco pe saluâ o pubrico.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I banchê manezzan i dinæ de tante persoñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I ben da tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I beseugni de l’anima e do còrpo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I beu pe-e còrne e i òmmi pe-a lengua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I beu tian a leza.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I boin boccoin costan cäi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I cannibali mangian e persoñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I cavaggëi de l’Etæ de Mezo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I cavaggëi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I chen baiavan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I çimmelli de rave.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I ciongi tian zu e ræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I conti no van ben, ghe dev’ëse un errô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I crövi no fan cardæñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I dinæ che gh’emmo dæto no gh’en bastæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I dinæ do cappellan cantando vëgnan, cantando van.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I dinæ son comme a rogna che chi l’à se â gratta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I doî sentê s’incroxan inte quello ponto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I driti de persoñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I erboi fan ombra a-a strâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I exammi do sangue.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I fæti parlan ciæo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I fæti son intravegnui in Argentiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I figgeu burlavan pe fâ rie e gente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I figgeu devan parlâ quande e galliñe piscian.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I figgeu do quartê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I figgeu en de feua che zeugan co-o ballon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I filòsofi inmæximan st’idea chì con quella de libertæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I fossoei no s’impan de rosâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I fraveghi conoscian l’öo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I galantòmmi an o pei into creuso da man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I laddri an sforsou a pòrta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I laddri l’an ligou à l’erbo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I laddri m’an descancasciou a pòrta con un martello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I lençeu cadi fan mangiâ e suppe freide.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I libbri da biblioteca beseugna tegnîli comme se deve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I libbri en anæti in stampa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I libbri en in lengua ligure, franseise ò spagnòlla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ amixi ghe saian a-a festa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ fæ m’an telefonou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ figgi vëgnan pe Dënâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ genitoî en i doî parenti che m’arresta ciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ salui a-a scignoa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ stan a-o Finâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ vexin de cà en refuoxi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mæ vexin en campen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I massachen an fæto un pertuso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I meghi an poia ch’o porrieiva perde a vista.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I meistri d’ascia do cantê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I meixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I mosaichi de risseu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I moscoin se gh’ean missi à giâ d’in gio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I nemixi an bruxou o bòsco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I nemixi preparan un assato.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I nòstri nemixi en asperti e grammi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Î ò visti passâ pe-a stradda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Î ò visti vëi, ma î ò intoppæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I òmmi no se mesuan à parmi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I òsci de çexe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I parlæ stòrichi da nòstra region.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I pescoei caccian a ræ in mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I pollin veuan fotte o pollaieu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I prævi veddan o diao da tutte e parte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I ricchi vëgnan pövei e a-a reversa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I rusci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I saçerdöti an sagrificou un beu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I scoläi se son fæti ciù bravi che i sò meistri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I segondi passan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I seu amixi en franseixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I seu figgi ean in desmuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I sordatti an arroinou a çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I sordatti an bombezzou a çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I sordatti an sponciou inderê l’assato.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I strasci de neie cazzeivan da-o çê comme ciumme.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I strassi de neive cazzan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I teu cavelli en ciù ciæi di seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I trafeghi pe mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I travaggi pe-a stradda avansan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I venti en in cheita inte l’Adriatico do settentrion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I vexin en stæti apreuvo a-o gatto tanto che no gh’ea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I vinti de settembre.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: I zoeni piggian moggê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Impëia a l’é a mæ çittæ de proveniensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Imprattichîse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In bon ponto e in bonn’oa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In cà no gh’é ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In cà ò o rescädamento à gazzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In casa do barba chi rompe paga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In casa neuva, chi no ghe ne pòrta no ghe n’attreuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In che paise ti væ usa comme ti treuvi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In compagnia o præve o piggia moggê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In giardin gh’é un erbo de limon e un de mei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In mancansa de megio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In Pontexello ghe n’é un atro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In ponto de træ, de quattro oe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In primmaveia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sce doî pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sce st’argomento son d’accòrdio con ti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sce sta dötriña i ciù tanti son d’accòrdio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In scî pissi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin che sei arrivæ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin no sò comme son arrestæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin ò dovuo dâ a desdita à l’appontamento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin o l’à averto i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin sei arrivæ!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin son doe filosofie che van unna contra l’atra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ fin, a l’ea vegnua matta pe in davei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ Mæña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ parma da man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ töa gh’é a fugassa ancon cada.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciâ ziña do lago.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciô cian da teoria ti gh’æ raxon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciô fondo de l’anima.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sciô tardi i muzai toccan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In sto paise no gh’accapita mai ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In tæra d’òrbi i guersci son scignori.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In televixon gh’é e previxon do tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: In tempo de guæra ciù böxie che tæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inandiâ de negoçiaçioin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inandiâ unn’attivitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Incangio de parlâ, stanni sitto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Incarregâ unna traduçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inciastro de sette fæñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Infiâ l’agoggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ingheuggise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inroccâ o re.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Insâ a botte de vin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Insâ o salamme, a bottiggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Insciâse à son de vento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Insegnâ ingleise inta scheua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta coa ghe stà o venin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta despensa arresta ciù solo che unna bottiggia de vin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta giornâ de domenega.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta mæ famiggia pe-o disnâ da domenega gh’ea l’andio d’anâ à mangiâ feua de casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta stançia gh’ea do gran invexendo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta stançia gh’ea un fortô de çetroin marsi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inta vinti çinque ghe semmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intanto che dormiva l’é vegnuo i laddri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intanto che parlavimo, o l’é passou l’òmmo de fighe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intanto o treno o s’ea misso à anâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intanto, i massachen tenzeivan a miagia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte l’insemme l’é dexe chilli.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte quarant’anni de economie a no l’arrivava à cattâse manco unna cascia da mòrto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte quella butega se vende à menuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte quello pòsto no gh’accapita mai ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte st’istöia no gh’é de sugo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte sti caxi, l’é megio no fâ ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte sto louëio se ghe travaggia o marmao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte sto stabilimento vëgne construto e vittue promòsse da l’açienda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inte un momento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inti bòschi gh’é de bestie sarvæghe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Inti meixi ch’an da vegnî doviemo limitâ e speise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Into ciù bon do seunno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Into Paxo ghe stava o duxe da Sëniscima Repubrica de Zena.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Into zeugo da cirolla, o sette de coppe o l’é o poncin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intran ò sciortan?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intrattegnî i figgeu con zeughi e demoe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Intriemo into bòsco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Introdue un neuvo produto in sciô mercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Introdue unna neuva mòdda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Istöia da Liguria, de l’Europa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Istöie de tære lontañe e dònne mäveggiose.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Italia do meridion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Italia do settentrion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’à ciantou de ceuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’à desmisso de ceuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’abbou o prega per noiatri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’accatto d’un terren.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’açento o l’é in sciâ primma scillaba.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’açion a no l’à avuo conseguensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua a fa deruâ e miage.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua a fa mâ e o vin o fa cantâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua a l’é vegnua giassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua a sciòrte da-o bronzin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua cada e l’ægua boggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua coâ a fa i baggeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua menua a l’inganna o villan, pâ che no ceuve e a ghe bagna o cabban.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’aerio o l’é in partensa pe Pariggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’agençia internaçionale da sanitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’aivan liguou con de cadeñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amiga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amigo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amministraçion da provinsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amô e a tossa no peuan stâ coverti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amô pe-a muxica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’amô pe-o pròscimo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an condannou sensa preuve do delitto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an coverto d’öo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an portou inte l’ospiâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an reçevua co-e brasse averte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an trapassâ con unna lansa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’an trattâ coscì mâ ch’a s’é missa à cianze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’anno ch’o vëgnepròscimo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’anno de primma ean stæti in Inghiltæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’anno passou semmo stæti in Greçia pe-e vacanse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’aò o l’é un arneise pe l’agricoltua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’asciascin o l’é schittou in pê, sätou (sciù) in pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ase o camalla o vin o beive l’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ase o pòrta un carrego de fruta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ase.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’assäto a-a Bastiggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’autô do romanso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’autô zeneise Federico Gazzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’aviæ zuou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é a testa ch’a commanda, no i pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ammancâ a luxe in tutto o quartê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é anæto avanti à ceuve fin à stamattin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é arrestou ciù doe fette de torta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é avansou do pan da vëi seia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é bello scigoâ quando i beu no veuan beive.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é cado, l’é freido.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ciæo che çercan de breighe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ciæo che no ne saveiva ninte mi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ciæo scin da-e primme linie do romanso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ciù a zonta che a carne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é ciù che giusto ch’a segge coscì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é comme domandâ à l’òste s’o gh’à do vin bon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é comme s’a m’aise dito d’anâ à cà do diao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é comme un regòrdo lontan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é de novembre.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é di anni che no se veddemmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é diffiçile che vëgnan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é doe oe de mattin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é doî meixi ch’a no prattica e leçioin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é eutt’oe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é façile che no î veddiò mai ciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é freido con tutto che gh’é o sô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio accattâ quande gh’é i rebasci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio andâ à casa con unna raxon mâ dita che co-a testa rotta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio aveili amixi che nemixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio ëse padron de unna sassoa che capitanio de unna nave.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio ëse solo che mâ accompagnou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio nasce affortunou che ricco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio o vin cado che l’ægua freida.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio perde o pöco che l’assæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio perde un dio che a man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio un aggiustamento magro che unna sentensa grassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio un dô de stacca che un dô de cheu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio un euvo ancheu che unna galliña doman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é megio vegnî rosci che neigri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é mëzaneutte e dexe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é mëzaneutte e un quarto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é occupou o bagno?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é passou o tempo che a Berta a fiava.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é pe coscì ch’o dixe ch’o â ciantià lì de fummâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é pezo a recheita che a mouttia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é scciuppou a guæra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é solo unna costion de lezze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é stæto attrovou di fòscili de l’epoca mesozòica.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é stæto neçessäio piggiâ de mesue.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é successo a-i neuve de mazzo do mille neuve çento quaranta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é tardi, beseugna ch’anemmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é tòsto neutte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é træ oe da mattin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é trezz’oe inte l’oa de Pechin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é tutto a-o conträio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é tutto abrettio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é tutto in menissi!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é un bòtto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é un pesso che no â veddeivan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é unn’istöia pe grendi e piccin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é unna veitæ ciæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é vegnuo l’oa de serrâ sta rattella chì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é za sëi oe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’é za settembre.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ea coverto de un seu gianco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ea i quattro d’ötobre do mille neuve çento çinquanta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ea oa d’anâsene à cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ea un piaxei d’ammiâla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’editô da collaña di libbri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ei promisso, donca beseugna che ô fæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’emmo conosciuo pe mezo do Zane.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’emmo conquistou con mai tanto giamin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’entuxasmo o l’é scentou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’erbo de Dënâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’erbo de meistra, a veia de meistra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’erbo de meistra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’espanscion de l’Impëio roman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’euggio do padron o governa o cavallo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’euggio o ne veu a sò parte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’euio contegnuo into porteuio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’euio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’Evangëio segondo Marco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’exerçito o l’à represso a rebellion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’imbriægo o dindaña intanto ch’o cammiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’incontro con un amigo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’infermê o se fava in quattro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’inno naçionale.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’inondaçion a l’à arroinou a çittæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’instituçion d’unna neuva scheua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’intrâ da casa a l’é into giardin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’intrâ prinçipâ de un edifiçio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’inverno o pòrta o freido.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò conosciua pe mezo de mæ coxa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò conosciua tra e gente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò dispòsto sensa tegnî conto do seu conseggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò dito mi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò fæto pe demoa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò fæto solo che pe vedde cös’o l’avieiva dito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò incontrâ da-a sciortia da metropolitaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò trovou sotta a-e Miage de Santa Ciæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ò vista avanti Dënâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’oa d’äia do prexonê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’occupaçion di austriachi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’Oceano Paçifico.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ödô de confittua o se spande pe-a stançia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’òmmo co-i cavelli gianchi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’òmmo de dinæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’òmmo o propoñe e Dio o dispoñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’òmmo o refuava o vin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’ötöio de Sant’Emo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’öxello o se pösa in sce l’erbo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: L’öxello o xeua.
