Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Segnô o ve conserve a vista, che l’appetitto l’ei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O segondo libbro o l’é stæto scrito da unna man neuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ô sei comm’a se ciamma quella costellaçion?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O senso de l’udia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O senso do gusto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sentê into bòsco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sentê o va avanti into bòsco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò sentio di corpi de tossa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò sentio un fô ch’o ne vegniva d’inta stançia vexiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò sentio un son destinto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ô sentivan da un chilòmetro de distansa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O serviçio de consegne à cà pe oua o l’é sospeiso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O seu numero de telefonin o l’é trei quattro çinque çinquant’e quattro sciusciant’un unze.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O seu rammo o l’é i freschi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O seunno o n’à piggiou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò sghindou unna machina.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sò carattere violento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sò fattoriso fäso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sò fin o l’é a feliçitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sò nataliçio o l’é a-i çinque de zennâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sô o se spegia into mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sordatto o l’attende l’erco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sordatto o l’é à cavallo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sovran e o seu accompagnamento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spartieiva a lendena pe piggiâghe o pigheuggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spettacolo o comensa da chì à no guæi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spettacolo o l’é finio e i attoî sciortan de da-o tiatro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spion o no l’à dito ninte manco quande ô tortuavan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spito e a matëia son doe cöse despægie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O spussa de vin ch’o l’anticheua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O sta inte un abitato da-e parte de Niòrche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O stà tutto o giorno a tiâ zu di tacchi contra o governo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Stato o serve a popolaçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Steva de Franchi o l’à traduto sta comedia da-o franseise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O strapontin o l’à dæto resciöo a-o pellegrin stanco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O strenze into pugno unna sciô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O studente o l’à arrigou o papê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O succao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tabacco o l’é montou che i stronsci fumman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tempo o l’arrangia tutto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tempo o l’é galantòmmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tenô da sò lettia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tenô de parolle do filòsofo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O terren o mòlla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O tiatro in zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò tiou unna pria.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Titanic o l’é anæto a-o fondo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O titolo de mego o me tocca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O titolo do romanso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò trascuou i mæ impegni.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggia inte un louëio d’un fravego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggia inte unn’agençia de viægi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggiava in pòrto à descarregâ e nave.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggiava tutta a neutte inte un forno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggio o me piggia a ciù parte da giornâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O travaggio o va ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O trei de coppe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O treno o l’ea in scî pissi de partî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O treno o m’à portou inderê verso Saña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò trovou un pòsto temporanio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò trovou unna lista de poule e ciù deuviæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò un appontamento mäcordì à unn’oa da neutte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò un brasso addormio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò un gran beseugno de despascionâme con quarchedun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò un gran mâ de ren.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò un mâ de denti da no credde.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò unna cösa da dâte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò unna famme che â veddo co-i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò unna gran raggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vâ a-o manco un mion de euro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O ve conosce da quande o l’ea un figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vegio co-i euggi sciuti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O velluo o l’é sciòcco à l’attasto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vento in poppa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vento o l’à fæto scentâ a negia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vento o s’ammerma.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O verso de unna bestia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O veu ëse pagou tanto comme lê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O veu partî ancheu à tutti i conti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O veu sempre dî a seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O veu tegnî segretto o nòstro impromisso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O viægio de nòsse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vin bon o non à beseugno de ramma.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vin o l’é o tettin di vegi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vin o s’é fæto axou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vin piggiou à mòddo o l’é megio che o bròddo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò visto a tæra promissa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò visto de bestie grende comme e baleñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò visto un che conoscio pe-a stradda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ô voei capî scì ò no?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O volumme de l’aradio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O volumme di comerci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O vorrieiva assomeggiâseghe a-a seua de scarpe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò vosciuo allevâme unna coæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò vosciuo fâ unna traduçion a-a lettia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O xeuo da Zena à Londra o l’é stæto disdito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O xeuo de l’öxello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ò za capio comm’a l’anià à finî sta costion!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Zane o dà o bon exempio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O Zane o marciava avanti à lô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zenzao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zeo o l’arroiña l’accuggeita.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zeugo de carte a-a zeneise.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zoeno o l’à fæto unna scena.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zöo o l’à un piccin de tigre.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: O zugou o s’é venduo a-i avversäi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oege di pesci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ògni cäso into cû o fa andâ un passo avanti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ògni regola a l’à e sò ecceçioin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Òmmo avvisou mezo sarvou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Òmmo capaçe à fâ de tutto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Òmmo de stampa antiga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Òmmo taggiou à l’antiga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Òsso de persego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ottant’e doe besagniñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ottant’e doî paisen.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ottant’un lençeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ottanta straponte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ou, voî ei sätou a coa!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua a l’é sciuta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua l’é o momento de mesciâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua me tocca lavâ i tondi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua no pòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua ò mai ciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua o vento o s’ammerma e o vëgne o sô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua scì che ghe semmo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua scì che ghe semmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua se mangia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua stâme ben à sentî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Oua vëgne o bello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Öxello de cattiva neuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pâ ch’o segge partio a settemaña passâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pâ ch’o vëgne da l’atro mondo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pâ vëi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pagâ co-o manego da spassoia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pagâ da mæxima monæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pagâ de monæa longa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pagâ lia, södo e dinâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pan co-i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pan de muniçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Papê bagnou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ adaxo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parla che sedonca t’ammasso!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ ciæo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ comme un libbro stampou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ da bon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ desboccou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ latin comme unna vacca spagnòlla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlâ, camminâ adaxo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlan in zeneise viaxo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlan un zeneise cortivou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlavan tra de lô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlemmo d’euve che l’é chì Pasqua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlemmo da grammatica do zeneise se ti veu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlemmo de poexia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlemmo di driti de dònne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlemmose ciæo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlime!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlimene pe piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlo à ti, seuxoa, che ti m’intendi, neua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parlo o zeneise, o savoneise, o ciavæn.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Parolasse brutte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Passâ à l’açion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Passaggiâ inte un parco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Passou quarche oa son sciortii.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pasta de cäçiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Patti ciæi, amixiçia longa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe anâ gh’é delongo tempo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe arvî o programma, fanni clic in sce sta figua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe caitæ do Segnô, no stæghe à toccâ a famiggia!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe caxo ti sæ quarcösa in sciâ costion?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe caxon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe conosce un böxardo, beseugna fâlo parlâ træ vòtte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe cös’o serve st’angæzo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe dâte unn’idea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe desgracia no pòsso fâ megio de coscì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe finî, lasciæme dî che l’é stæto un veo piaxei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe fortuña an conosciuo de ficco a ciappoa do nemigo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe ligure s’intende l’insemme di parlæ da Liguria, compreiso e forme locale.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe mi a l’é a mæxima.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe natua i draffin son de bon incontro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe passâ da-a pòrta o l’à da cegâ a testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe piaxei, açendi a luxe
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe piaxei, scià me o sa dî che oa l’é?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe primma cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe propòste de collaboraçion in sciâ traduçion da mæxima sciâ peuan scrivine.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe un momento emmo posciuo ammiâ e stelle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe un ponto Martin o l’à perso l’ase.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-a costion do scito cöse t’æ deçiso?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-a traduçion m’an dæto duxento unze euro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-i mæ gusti a gh’é tròppa sâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-o ciù e cöse che ti dixi son giuste.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-o ciù i dôsci no me gustan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-o momento o contegnuo de sta pagina o l’é à dispoxiçion solo che in lengua italiaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pe-o scuo no ghe veddeiva un bellin inta stançia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pelle e òsse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pensa primma de parlâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Penso a-o cammin ch’ò za fæto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Penso ch’arrestiò à travaggiâ fin a-a seia in sciô tardi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché a-o manco no ti dæ unna man d’aggiutto a-e tò seu?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché en assettæ lazù inte quello canto?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché no mangiæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché no v’affermæ pe-a çeña?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché ti me ravatti inte stacche?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché ti sbraggi coscì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perché, no l’é vea?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Percöse fæ tanto sciato?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Percöse l’emmo piggiou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Percöse t’ê triste?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Percöse ti sbraggi coscì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perde da-o tappo e da-a spiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perdise apreuvo à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Perdise inti detaggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Però oua ti t’arrangi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Però sta fugassa a l’é tròppo drua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pertuso do rattaieu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pescio d’ægua doçe, pescio de mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Peu dâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piccâ a porta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piccâ co-a testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piccan co-o martello in sciâ miagia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ à cäsci unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a çeia a-o consummo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a difeisa de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a penscion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a spòrta e i færi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a-a preuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ a-o consummo unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ de mesue de restriçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ e sò mesue ne-o fâ unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ exempio da unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ l’ammia in sciô bersaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ l’asbrio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ l’asmia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ l’euggio do cû pe unna ciaga.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ lampo comme a povie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ o cheuio à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ o desciù à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ o dexe de dinæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggia o pægua perché anià à ceuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ o sugo da un libbro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ o tempo comm’o ven.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ parte à unna manifestaçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ un figgeu, un cagnetto in adoçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâ unn’impreisa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâse a peña de fâ unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâse de gatte ligæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâse l’assonto de fâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâse un ballon inta faccia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâse un resato.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâsela con còmmodo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggiâsela in rie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggio l’autobo tutti i giorni pe anâ in sciô travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggio o pægua de za che ceuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piggite ancon un pittin de doçe!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pigheuggio infainou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Piscia ciæo e incaghite do mego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Polenta co-i mòtti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pòmmo de reusa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ponente-meistro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ponto incroxou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Porcaia de onge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ a borsa in scê spalle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ à scheuve e bestie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ a-a roviña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ de boñe neuve.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ in bocca comme i chen barbin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ in carreghetta in d’öo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ o desmuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portâ unna cadenetta a-o còllo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pòrtilo con ti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portime unna bottiggia de vin gianco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Portiò i vòstri ögui, i vòstri salui.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Poulo o l’é o figgio ciù piccin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pöveo figgeu!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Præ Gazzo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Predican che o Segnô o l’à creou l’universo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pregâ co-e brasse in croxe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pregan e se battan o peto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Preisa de tabacco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Prescion erta in sciô Mediterraneo do mezo de ponente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Presentâ un programma de televixon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Previxon valida fin à mëzaneutte de doman e tendensa inte dozz’oe apreuvo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pria travaggiâ da-o tempo, da l’ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Primma che comensemmo, beseugna che seggimo tutti d’accòrdio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Primma d’anâ inderê à casa beseugna che passe à cattâ ancon un pâ de cöse a-o supermercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Primma de moî beseugna veddine de belle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Primma de stiâ i lençeu, beseugna destendili ben ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Primma finiscio o lou, dòppo sciòrto de cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Prinçipe ereditäio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Privâ quarchedun do sò travaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Prononçiâ ben e paròlle.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pronti?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pronto a-o sagrifiçio pe-i sò amixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pròpio à propòxito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pròpio coscì, t’æ raxon!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pròpio dòppo Dënâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Provæ à passâ de chì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pubricâ inte unna revista.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Pubricâ un libbro, un cine.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ a l’é a machina ch’a t’ê ciù caa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ l’é o senso da vitta?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ o l’é ch’o t’é ciù cao?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ o l’é o ligure che se deuvia chì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ o l’é o treno?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quæ o l’é o volumme da Tæra?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quand’o m’à visto passâ pe-a stradda, o m’à ciammou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quand’o s’é dæto conto da festa à sorpreisa che gh’aivimo inandiou o s’é commòsso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande dòrmo sciato delongo o letto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande gh’é cado a giassa a se deslengua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande gh’é da fâ un servixo, o no dixe mai de no.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande ghe l’ò dito, o no voeiva creddighe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande ghe sata a bostica, o comensa à tiâ zu di tacchi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande i cavelli fan gianchin, lascia e dònne e attacchite a-o vin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande l’é ch’o l’à comensou à insegnâ inte l’universcitæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande l’é che ariemmo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande l’é che dan e pagelle?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande no l’an trovâ in cà son sciortie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande o pöveo o fa limöxina a-o ricco o diao o se ne rie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande s’é fæto giorno eimo ancon apreuvo co-o viægio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande s’é in ballo beseugna ballâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande sciortià o pròscimo libbro da saga?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande ti arrivi?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande ti l’æ a pròscima vixita?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande ti vëgni à trovâme?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quande vegniei torna à Saña?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando ceuve e luxe o sô, tutte e strie fan l’amô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando no ghe n’é, a gexa a ne perde.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando o çê o l’é fæto à pan, se no ceuve ancheu ceuve doman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando o gatto o passaggia, i ratti stan ascosi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando se ven vegi s’é schivæ da tutti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quando ti gh’andavi, mi ne vegniva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quant’a ghe mette sta vittua pe arrivâ a-i çento chillòmetri à l’oa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quant’a vëgne sta scurtua de bronzo?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante ghe veu pe arrivâ fin à in çentro?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante n’emmo ancheu?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante o l’é grande sto campo chì?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante o t’à ciammou pe-e caròttoe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante o vëgne quello libbro?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante oe ti studdi a-o giorno?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante t’æ camminou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante t’an ciammou pe dâ recatto a-e scarpe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante t’é bella!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante ve tocca spende a-o meise apreuvo a-a pixon?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante vëgnan ste meizañe?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quante vegniva i bròccoli?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quarant’e quattro lampadiñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quaranta giorni de seçia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quarchedun o m’à dito che o Marco o l’é anæto in penscion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quarcösa da mette sotta i denti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quattòrze pôtroñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quattro çento dozze sordatti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quattro mia eutto çento vint’eutto litri d’euio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quattro scemmi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quell’òmmo o l’é un santo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quella a l’é unn’atra cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quella lì a l’é mæ moggê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quella sò äia da patriçio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quelli gatti stan a-o sô tutto o giorno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quelli son i figgeu (de) che te diva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello ch’ò into cheu l’ò in bocca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello ch’o l’à fæto o parla da pe lê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello chi no va in campaña va in battaggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello figgeu o l’é un tresto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello figgeu o mäveggiava tutti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello lì o l’é o mæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello lì oua o no gh’intra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello òmmo o ghe mette angoscia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello pöveo figgeu o l’é finio in prexon.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello pöveo meschinetto o cianzeiva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Quello vin o l’é grammo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Questa a l’é grania!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Questa a l’é gròssa!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Questa menestra a l’é un pö savoia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Questo figgio de unna scignoa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Rattellâse co-o prinçipâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Raxonâ pe categorie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Reçitâ inte unna comedia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Redoggiâ e maneghe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Redoggiâse e maneghe da camixa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Regâ o terren, dâ da beive o terren.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Regiña de coppe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Remettise inte moen de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Rendise mävosciuo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Respio l’äia boña de montagna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Responde a-e paròlle co-i fæti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Responde a-o telefono.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Restâ con unna magnâ de mosche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Restâ con unna magnâ de vento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Riçeive unna smentia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ridue unna persoña in sce l’astrego.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Risponde con superbia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Röba chi manda un cattivo ödô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Röba da fâ rie i bibin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Röba da fâ vegnî i cavelli driti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Röba da figgeu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Röba finiscima accattâ a-o mercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Roggiâ i denti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Rompî a testa à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Rompî o zazzun.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Rondaniña teito à teito pòrta l’euio à San Beneito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Roviñe romañe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’à da fâ pe fòrsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’accapivan sens’atro che co-o mesciâ di euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’ambiscian de cà seu.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’arræiva e nuvie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’é sacciuo ch’o s’aiva accattou a laurea.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’ea formou de linie che se veddeivan apeña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’ean a-a dreittua incallæ à domandâghelo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’ean invexendæ pe-o discorso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’exerçitemmo insemme pe l’examme?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: S’o s’arraggia, o diventa unna bestia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sabbo son anæti a-o Paxo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sacco veuo no peu stâ in pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Saçiâse.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: San Loenso gran cädua, Sant’Antögno gran freidua, l’uña e l’atra pöco dua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: San Loenso l’é i dexe d’agosto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: San Loenso o l’é a-i dexe d’agosto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: San Tommou, ben zazzunou e mâ affestou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Santi in gexa e diäi in casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Savei a vitta e i miacoi de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Savei de che pê sòppega unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Savei fâ fiña o foamme à l’agoggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Savei unna cösa da bon canâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sbatte a pòrta con violensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sbatte e ae.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scappâ comme o diao da l’ægua beneita.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scappâ da-e onge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scappâla da unna maggia rotta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scatoa à beuiletto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scciao, comme ti stæ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Schissâ i çerci à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Schivala da unna miagia rotta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scì ch’a l’é unna bella dònna, ma à mi a no me gusta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scì, pròpio coscì!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scì, va ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ çercan unna referensa in sce papê?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià l’agge paçiensa, sto pòsto pe caxo o l’é occupou?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià l’agge paçiensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià l’aggradisce un cafè?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ l’an de atre domande?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià l’intra voscià pe-o primmo, sciô Reboa!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià me scuse sciô Parödi, voscià no l’ò visto!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià me scuse, no voeiva disturbâla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià me scuse, ò sbaliou de persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ mette unna firma chì e ghe semmo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià ne pigge voscià pe-o primmo, sciô giudiçe!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ no en boin à leze e transcriçioin fonetiche?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià no se n’inmesce pe piaxei, professô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ peu firmâ chì sotta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià s’affermià pe disnâ, sciâ Döia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià s’ô pigge, sciâ meistra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scià sa dîme pe caxo dond’a l’é l’intrâ?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ saviæ dîme che oa l’é?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciâ vagghe fin a-o semafero, dapeu sciâ gie in sciâ manciña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciaccâ un pommello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciaccâse e die con unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciben che mæ poæ o no m’à dæto o permesso, a-a festa ghe vaggo à tutte e mainee.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciben che no me sento ben, me son tiou sciù.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciöpo de reusa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciortî à pê sciuti da unna cösa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciortî d’in casa, sciortî de casa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciortî d’inta stançia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciugâle à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciummâ o læte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciuscia o vento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciusciant’e sette milaneixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciusciant’eutto piemonteixi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Sciuscianta cammi pin de fruta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scoâ a cäçiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scompartimenti de sganzie e armäi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scòrse de bazzaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scrito à man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scrive in lettie picciñe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scròllo l’erbo pe fâ cazze i mei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Scrovîse o panê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se â rian de niatri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se a scheña a no loua, a pansa a patisce.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se a-o manco o stesse sitto!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se arve un prefondo, e ne sciòrte un diao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se bollemmo in mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se capisce ch’ean inversæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se capisce che tutto l’é poscibile.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se ceuve o giorno de l’Ascençion, l’annâ a va in perdiçion.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se davan d’attorno pe guägnâ a regatta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se fæ un errô, scassælo con unna riga in çimma.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se favan battezzâ into sciumme Zordan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se incangio pensan de fâ differente, tanto megio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se l’avian ascordou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se lamentan delongo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se levavan o pan d’in bocca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se m’accapitesse l’occaxon, ô faiæ torna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se m’é rotto o telefono.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se mangemmo un dattao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Se metteivan à töa con lô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/
