Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna persoña pægia à unn’atra.

Sentence: Unna persoña pesante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna pessa imbastia a l’é meza cuxia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna piccaggetta de coton.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna pisaña, doe zeneixi e træ pëgiñe intran inte un bar.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna poscibilitæ ben ben picciña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna preghea in versci.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna preisa de sâ, de succao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna quantitæ determinâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna ricca colleçion de quaddri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna sagoggiâ de sinsaa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna scerpa de sæa, de laña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna scignoa fiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna sciô bleuçê e unna giana.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna sciô giana.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna scòrsa de lumassa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna sentensa mesuâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna spussa ch’a piggia a-a goa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna statua de marmao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna streuppa de vacche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna töa de marmao.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna vea moæ de famiggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna veia quæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna veuga de passo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna via d’äsâ modello emme doî.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna vista mäveggiosa do gorfo de Marseggia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna vittöia ciæa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna vivagna d’ægua pua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna voxe profonda.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unna xatta de menestra fummante.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Unze vòtte a-o giorno.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: V’ò mandou un fax stamattin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Va ben, graçie!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Va ben?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù a prattica che a sciensa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù a sarsa che o pescio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù un ase vivo che un dottô mòrto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù un bon nomme che tutti i dinæ do mondo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù unn’onsa de reputaçion che un rubbo d’öo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù unn’onsa de sòrte che çento lie de savei.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ ciù unna berretta che çento scoffie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vâ tanti agnelli à Pasqua quanti beu à Dënâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vaggo à addesciâ mæ fræ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vaggo avanti pe fin che e gambe me tëgnan.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Van d’amô e d’accòrdio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vanni à ciammâ teu seu, l’é pronto in sciâ töa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vanni à dâ unna man d’aggiutto a-e tò seu!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vanni a-a pagina sette.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vanni torna into pòsto straman da-o quæ t’ê sciortio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vantëi g’é stæto o mortöio de mæ barba.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Variabile, fòrsa doe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve â catto mi a machina neuva.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve conoscei?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve fasso a mæ propòsta finale.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve gusta unna partia de ballon?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve l’an za dito?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve l’ei gödie e vacanse?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve l’emmo za dito, ma no n’ei dæto a mente!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve l’ò da cantâ in muxica?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Ve sei demoæ a-a festa?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vedde o sô à quaddretti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veddiò a mæ nevetta sabbo ch’o ven.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veddise into spegio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veddo un passaliçio tra i erboi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veggiâ a-a luña e dormî a-o sô, no s’aquista né röba né önô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëgne anche liatri a-a festa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî à cà mæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî à l’arma gianca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî besiggiou da unna bestieta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëgni chì che t’arrangio a berretta in sciâ testa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî cian cianin, à un pe vòtta.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî co-o cheu in man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî de corsa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî vegio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnî zu l’ægua à segge.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëgni, assettemmose in sciô zerbo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegniò à pê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vegnivan zu da-o bricco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëgno mi ascì.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi a festa a l’ea un mortöio!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi l’ea i çinque.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi mattin ò preparou o pesto pe doman.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi neutte no emmo dormio ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi seia ea con Mario.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi seia son anæto à mangiâ a fugassa co-i mæ amigi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi semmo anæti pe ancioe.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi t’ò ciammou, ma no ti gh’ëi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vëi un o t’à çercou.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Venardì passou se semmo visti à De Ferræ da-a fontaña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vende zu à rotta de còllo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vento e movimento de onde in scî moæ italien.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vestia comme unna regiña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vestio d’un vestî gianco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuan vegnî rispettæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio acciantâ de fummâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio cangiâ o mæ destin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio dâve un conseggio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio dexe mia lie pe sto libbro.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio dî un segretto à voscià, præ Mattê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio dî, ghe n’ò træ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio ëse pagou ätretanto.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio esprimme i mæ dubbi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio fâ coscì, sedonca ninte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio fâ o bagno into mâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio i dinæ che me pertocca.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio lasciâve a libertæ de çerne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio organizzâ tutti i mæ libbri.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio parlâ à lê de persoña, solo à lê.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio piggiâ quella persoña à modello.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio savei a veitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio savei cös’a va dito.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Veuggio strenze neuve amixiçie.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Viatri ascì sei contra a caccia?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Viatri comensæ à mangiâ, arrivo inte un segondo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Viatri conoscei i poeti zeneixi moderni?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vin aspio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vin chi sata a-i euggi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vin de duata.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vin e pittanse de tutte e qualitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vin vegio, amixi vegi e libbri vegi.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vint’un anni e mezo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vinti doe compagne de l’universcitæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vinti doî compagni de scheua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vinti in sce çento.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vittima de unna mouttia.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vive à Zena, à Saña, à Turin e à Londra.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voei addrissâ e gambe a-i stòrti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voei anâvene?
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voei ben à unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voei fâ vedde o neigro pe gianco.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voei vedde mòrta unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voeiva fâghe unna sorpreisa.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voeiva fâli contenti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voeiva giusto parlâte.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voeiva solo feliçitâme con ti.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voeivan sciortî, incangio son arrestæ à cà.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voemmo ëse pagæ tanto comme lô.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Vorriæ capîghe ciù ben.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voscià sci che scià l’é un amigo!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Voscià scià l’é matto ò scià ne veu piggiâ in gio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Za, l’é vea!
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zazzunâ à pan e ægua.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zeneise, monegasco, tabarchin e spezzin en de varietæ ligure.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zero virgola un.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zeuggia ch’a vëgne.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zeuggia passâ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zeugo de man.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zöna d’instabilitæ in sciô Mâ da Libia de ponente.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zuâ a-e moen de unna persoña.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zuâ o fäso.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ à chi fa megio.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ à chi perde guägna.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ à croxe e à griffo.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ a-e busche.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ in sciâ paròlla.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâ l’asso de dinæ.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/

Sentence: Zugâsela co-o roscin.
Source: DEIZE, Council for Ligurian Linguistic Heritage, 2019-2023, https://conseggio-ligure.org/en/dictionary/deize/
